remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided pump is deactivated.

placard.para: Placard affected Pump Control switch "INOP" and enter in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Select affected pump control switch OFF.
For the inoperative pump, open and collar the appropriate circuit breaker on P11 panel.
Establish external or APU electrical power.
Select both engine generators to OFF.
On EICAS maintenance control portion of P61 panel:
Select the operative C2(C1) electric hydraulic pump ON.
Confirm center hydraulic pressure is 2900 psi (minimum).
Return both engine generator switches to ON.
